availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William T. Henry (Nicholas County, KY, cabinet maker)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, cabinet maker. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy T. Hall Henry in Nicholas County on November 8, 1855. Father of Elizabeth Henry and Fanny Henry. Cabinet maker in Nicholas County in 1860. Undertaker in Nicholas County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 1 (Carlisle), p. 278
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film #000252392, p.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Nicholas County, KY, July 1863, p. 18, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
